passages.text:
You almost made it, you almost didn't 
   <red> GET SWATTED <red>
THEY BUST DOWN YOUR FRONT DOOR
CLIMB OUT OF YOUR TOILET IN SCUBA GEAR
THEY WILL GET YOU
passages.name: BIG BAD END

passages.text:
As the words leave you lips you notice a laser on your chest, and hear a loud bang from your front door, a S.W.A.T. team has broken into your apartment. 

<Red> YOU HAVE BEEN SWATTED <red>

Bad End 1 Rip Bozo
passages.name: Bad End 1

passages.text: You Died
passages.name: Bad End 2

passages.text: You just can't handle living can ya? Stop that.
passages.name: Bad End 4

passages.text:
A message appears on your screen from an inknown source
"I agree man but you shouldn't of said that out loud."

You barely have to time read that message befrore 
<red> YOU GOT SWATTED <red>
THE TEAM BREAKS THROUGH YOUR WINDOWS
YOUR LANDLORD WILL CHARGE FOR THOSE
LOST YOUR DEPOSIT AND GOING TO JAIL
passages.name: Bad End Landlords

passages.text:
Bad time kid, stop sucking.

DEAD
passages.name: Bad end 3

passages.text: COCAINE IS BAD THE CONTRABAND WILL BE COLLECTED
passages.name: Bad end funny alt lvl4

passages.text:
A Bad Choice ends the game they get SWATTED
A Neutral choice frmo any path moves them to the Neutral Prompts
A Good Choice Moves them to the next Good Prompt

Rules:
Prompts can have up to 80 characters.
Answers can have up to 25 characters.


16 Bad ends             1/16

12 Neutral choices   2/12
4 Neutral prompts   0/4

9 Good options        0/9    
4 Good prompts      0/4

Prompt one:  COMPLETE
B1 N2 G1

Neutral prompt 1
B1 N2 G1

Neutral prompt 2
B1 N2 G1

Neutral prompt 3
B1 N2 G1

Neutral Prompt 4
B2 N1 G1


Good Prompt 1
B2 N1 G1

Good Prompt 2
B2 N1 G1

Good Prompt 3 
B3 N1 G1

Good Prompt 4
B3 N1 G1
passages.name: Developer notes

passages.text:
You were a spy all along and can't risk them hearing what you need to say.

Game over agent.
passages.name: Easter eggs

passages.text:
Good prompt goes here

[[You fucked up->Bad End 2]] 

[[Neutrality is not the spice of life ->Neutral prompt 1]] 

[[Also not so good ->Neutral prompt 1]] 

[[You did it ->Good prompt 2]]

links.name: Neutrality is not the spice of life

passages.name: Good Prompt 1

passages.text:
Almost there one last good prompt after this

[[Bad ideas mcGee over here aren't cha ->Bad End 4]]

[[Have you considred dissasocsiating? You seem like you are. ->Neutral Prompt 3]]

[[You can read right? ->Neutral Prompt 3]] 

[[Don't need a hand to hold ->Good Prompt 4]]

links.name: Bad ideas mcGee over here aren't cha
Have you considred dissasocsiating? You seem like you are.
Don't need a hand to hold

passages.name: Good Prompt 3

passages.text: You are somewhat problematic for the agents listening in, but you haven't said anything they could really consider a threat. You continure to be monitored but nothing changes.
passages.name: Good ending 1

passages.text:
Good job this is the second one, this game should be harder now

[[Bad choices here ->Bad end 3]] 

[[Could be worse ->Neutral Prompt 2]] 

[[Get in the game ->Neutral Prompt 2]] 

[[Progress weee ->Good Prompt 3]]
passages.name: Good prompt 2

passages.text: Your life is fairly boring and safe, you just chat with you friend and vent about a few things. You never even notice when they eventually take bugs out of your apartment as they mark you down as not a threat.
passages.name: Neutral End

passages.text:
